name: Yo Ho Ho!
喲呵呵
와하하!

desc_short: Boost ATK by 30% and nullify stone
提高30%攻擊的數值+石化無效
Augmente l'ATT de 30% et annule pétri.
Erhöht ANG um 30% und annulliert Stein.
Aumenta el ATQ un 30% y anula piedra
desc_long: Boosts ATK by 30% and nullifies stone.
提高30%攻擊的數值並使石化狀態無效。
Augmente l'ATT de 30% et annule pétrification.
Erhöht ANG um 30% und annulliert Stein.
Aumenta el ATQ un 30% y anula piedra
